Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe is unparalleled in its quality and value. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards, making it an invaluable asset for those seeking excellence. Considering its unique features and benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
